johnny hamerstix.bio: Walkin' on walkways, drinkin' from cups. Get real!

John Smith.bio: Average, run-of-the-mill, standard issue, base model citizen.

Qui-Gon Jinn.bio: Immortal Jedi looking for work in the afterlife. M.A. in The Force and M.S. in Midiclorian Technologies. Excells at separating children from their parents. Strong ability to make empty promises of a bright future.
